apps.banner: Cloudflare Apps are deprecated and will be sunset in the near future. We will be creating a new Apps experience. If you're interested, leave us feedback and sign up [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1fJOT5u7EvcalafPfQlfchLGvDLfC4-Rc-p-YmTVwI6g).
